name: Human Evolution
description: "Human Evolution" is the first design from the "Historical I, Portrait Collection" series, portraying great minds wronged by humanity's thoughts. Together with the "Lidimist Manifesto," this piece started the Lidimistic art movement. Using the "Figurative Lidimism," the piece shows Charles Darwin as part of animal life in an animalistic way, an inseparable part of a world in which reality is not directly accessible to the eye.
